channel.title: Making a development team!562
channel.description:
Hello, would you like to be in a development for a new upcoming MMORPG game? This will be in the base of Java, and C/C++. This is not an easy job but it is a huge opportunity to be apart of this team. We will be starting, more when we get everything Organized and ready to start. You may think to yourself, "It sounds quite interesting resting and i would like to join, But will it be successful?" With your help this can be a awesome sucsess.
-- Epic-Pking "562" -- Epic-Pking will basicly be a free and online game for everyone. We will have Member's and Free user's. As we know, we cannot host 100'000's of people on the one dedicated server so we must have several dedicated server's with different worlds. The gaming will be HD and will be 3D to all members. Full screan mode is only for paid members. This is a hige project as you all see, we are trying our hardest to make this your game and have what you want in it! Ofcourse i will give a gift to all HF member's who have joined. We will create a hat model with the letter's HF on the top. This item will not be able to be traded but it can be destroyed. Also, the group's i am in will also get a item made for there group name.
This is not very easy to get staff on the forum's or the game. This is a hard earning matter, witch you must work hard to earn it. All staff members will have there own little image ingame and on the forums. This may confuse some people but we will have two forums in one website. Ofcourse we will have our Game forums will board's, but i had some PM'S that i should open a second forum. The second forum will be a general forum with all the basic's on it. We will have MyAward's and Tabbed Menu on that forums. Having two forum's sound's awesome but it's hard work running a game and two forums all at once so i will need some awesome help from you guy's to manage my second forums.
Abit off topic there but back to the game. We will have awesome 3D monser's with Sound's. We will also, make some old fasion thing's like camelot castle and have some NPC'S called King Auther and that all. This is not a game for only children this can be for people any age. We will also, have a translator that will translate everything to what language you would like. You can build your own house and have your own pet's, but make sure you feed your pet! We cannot start this development team intill we have everyone we need. We will also love you suggestion's but make sure this is not an other game or already in use. Basicly your living a second magical life that everytime you die you reborn. We will have skill's you can train, we will have some commandment's for staff. Remember, this is not a private server, this is a never seen MMORPG GAME.
Well, this is about it for now, if you have any question's regarding the game or forum please add my messenger or Private Message me. My Messenger is at the buttom. --
Job's and Description's; --
Lead Developer - Leader of the Development for the game base. [Java C#}
Developers - Development for the game base. [Java C#}
Lead Content Developer - Leader of the developers that develop content. [Java C#}
Content Team - Development of language programing scripts. [Java C#}
Lead Designer - Design's graphic's for the game or website.
Detail Designer - Design's Intense and hard graphics.
Graphic Designer - Normal and everyday graphics.
Animators - Animate's image's and NPC'S.
Lead Modeler(s) - Model's Items, Objects, Monsers and Npc's.
Modeler(s) - Model's Items, Objects, Monsers and Npc's.
Lead Tester - Beta Test's the website, and game when they have fineshed.
Testers - Beta Test's the website, and game when they have fineshed.
Lead Audio Media - Create's sound's and music tracks.
Audio Media - Create's sound's and music tracks.
Lead Chararter - Design's the player chararter and its clothings.
Lead Chararter - Design's the player chararter and its clothings.
Lead Web Developer - Develop's the website using HTML and PHP.
Webdeveloper - Develop's the website using HTML and PHP.
Lead Programers - General game programmer, scripts, suggestion's.
Event Manager - Discussion's on upcoming event's and plan them.
Lead GUI Artist - Creates professinal GUI'S for the game client.
GUI Artist - Creates Professinal GUI'S for the game client.
Community Management - Actively check's board's and leark around the forums [Not Moderator]
Dierector - Direrector is a development manager, he has a chart will all what need's to be done.
Lead Advertiser - Advertise the game on site's and promotion's.
Advertiser - Advertise the game on site's and promotion's.
Article/Writer - Create's article will 100% great grammar.
-- Application --
Full Name:
Country/State:
Age:
About yourself:
What Job Would You Like?:
Experienced:
Show Off Work:
Skills:
Email:
MSN Messenger:
Are you very Interested:
Reason you would like to join:
Will you do everything your asked to?:
Others:
Please Private Message me you app thanks.
*Note, The game is more important. We need graphics Designers, Programmer's and Modelers.*
Messenger: levi_f7@hotmail.com < Add me if you are intrested! >

item.title: Making a development team!562
item.dc:creator: @Chick_Pkz Chick Pkz
item.description:
@Chick_Pkz wrote:

Yes, Don’t leech Cosmic Mist’s Codes. Your work must be your own. Stealing other people’s work is unacceptable and isn’t tolerated here. Also, Don’t double post.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Making a development team!562
item.dc:creator: @sandman2866 sandman2866
item.description:
@sandman2866 wrote:

Hello, would you like to be in a development for a new upcoming MMORPG game? This will be in the base of Java, and C/C++. This is not an easy job but it is a huge opportunity to be apart of this team. We will be starting, more when we get everything Organized and ready to start. You may think to yourself, “It sounds quite interesting resting and i would like to join, But will it be successful?” With your help this can be a awesome sucsess.

–
Epic-Pking “562”

Epic-Pking will basicly be a free and online game for everyone. We will have Member’s and Free user’s. As we know, we cannot host 100’000’s of people on the one dedicated server so we must have several dedicated server’s with different worlds. The gaming will be HD and will be 3D to all members. Full screan mode is only for paid members. This is a hige project as you all see, we are trying our hardest to make this your game and have what you want in it! Ofcourse i will give a gift to all HF member’s who have joined. We will create a hat model with the letter’s HF on the top. This item will not be able to be traded but it can be destroyed. Also, the group’s i am in will also get a item made for there group name.

This is not very easy to get staff on the forum’s or the game. This is a hard earning matter, witch you must work hard to earn it. All staff members will have there own little image ingame and on the forums. This may confuse some people but we will have two forums in one website. Ofcourse we will have our Game forums will board’s, but i had some PM’S that i should open a second forum. The second forum will be a general forum with all the basic’s on it. We will have MyAward’s and Tabbed Menu on that forums. Having two forum’s sound’s awesome but it’s hard work running a game and two forums all at once so i will need some awesome help from you guy’s to manage my second forums.

Abit off topic there but back to the game. We will have awesome 3D monser’s with Sound’s. We will also, make some old fasion thing’s like camelot castle and have some NPC’S called King Auther and that all. This is not a game for only children this can be for people any age. We will also, have a translator that will translate everything to what language you would like. You can build your own house and have your own pet’s, but make sure you feed your pet! We cannot start this development team intill we have everyone we need. We will also love you suggestion’s but make sure this is not an other game or already in use. Basicly your living a second magical life that everytime you die you reborn. We will have skill’s you can train, we will have some commandment’s for staff. Remember, this is not a private server, this is a never seen MMORPG GAME.

Well, this is about it for now, if you have any question’s regarding the game or forum please add my messenger or Private Message me. My Messenger is at the buttom.
